definition: loosely connected horny sections at the end of a rattlesnake's tail, shake and cause to make a rattling noise
details:
noun
- loosely connected horny sections at the end of a rattlesnake's tail
- a baby's toy that makes percussive noises when shaken
- a rapid series of short loud sounds (as might be heard with a stethoscope in some types of respiratory disorders)
= example: a rapid series of short loud sounds (as might be heard with a stethoscope in some types of respiratory disorders)
= synonyms: rattling, rale
verb
- shake and cause to make a rattling noise
- make short successive sounds
